website_summaries.verdict: The Belkin iPad Mini Keyboard Case is one of the better keyboard cases currently available for the Mini -- but it does have its shortcomings.
pros: The Belkin Portable Keyboard Case for iPad Mini is trim and stylish, it's easy to pair via Bluetooth, and it offers long battery life
Also, the keys are hard and relatively tactile
cons: The keyboard is a little cramped and there's no dedicated apostrophe/quotation key
It doubles the weight of your iPad Mini

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money...
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this a couple of months now and I only use the iPad about once a week on average and already it is broke. The clip that is supposed to keep the iPad in place against the part of the cover that folds down for keyboard use broke apart when opening it the other day. Also, the entire thing is really just awkward when trying to use it. It does not fold well at all when using it tablet mode - it leaves the keyboard partial exposed and is hard to hold. In hind sight I would pay more and just get a better keyboard/cover combo.
customer_reviews.author: Dean C.

customer_reviews.title: Great little key board
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little keyboard / case I like it and it works flawlessly but now that I have it I dont use it as much as I thought I would. This was for my first Tablet an I pad mini I love it and its won me over but most of my surfing is point n click then when doing e mail reply I go to the keyboard unless its just a quick comment then it just easier to use the pop up on screen keys All in all I still recommend it for its functionality alone
customer_reviews.author: Ray, Amy & Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the Belkin Keyboard I do a lot of writing on the go, so I thought this was going to be very useful, nevertheless, the keys are way too small (kind of expected) and sometimes it is hard to get the ipad to stay up. Also the materials feel very cheap and this make the ipad mini too bulky. The battery life time is ok though. I don't use it anymore as I switched to an external keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Israel

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't crazy about this device when I first received it, as the keys had a cheap, wobbly feel to them. Then the keyboard separated itself from the case within days. It seemed to have been attached only by a piece of thick black tape. I've had satisfactory performance from other Belkin products in the past, but this one was an absolute disappointment and wound up in the trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Greysmoke

customer_reviews.title: Great for children.  Fast shipping. Sturdy design.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely had the item shipped out fast and quality was as expected. No problems with the buyer experience at all. The product is NOT for people who need a full-sized keyboard. The space bar and backspace buttons are in the incorrect position. This item has been sitting on the shelf since it was purchased, and will most likely stay until I pass my ipad mini down to my children. Excellent product for children that use an ipad mini to type and search the Internet for school. In my mind, not worthy of being marked as a business tool - Perfect for intermediate/grammar school application.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Sula

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as it looks
customer_reviews.text: First of alla the keyboard is very good because it is very comfortable. None the less the clip that holds the IPad broke and the plastic clip that is covered with a rubber part has detached for the rubber part and the iPad falls flat when you are using the keyboard. The cover used to be black and after only a month of use it has lost its color and is now gray. Finally you should have a screen cover because when the screen and the keyboard touch when the case is closed the iPad screen gets scratched as well as the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Maria de los Angeles Orozco

customer_reviews.title: Problems...
customer_reviews.text: When the keyboard works it is great. Ordered three and 2 had problems. Mainly the keys stay depressed. The one keyboard we kept is still working fine. Update: The surviving keyboard started to have keyboard sticking issues and when inserting the USB to charge it popped in to the keyboard. I exerted minimal pressure and had it positioned correctly. Stay away from this keyboard.... it's a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: OnPoint

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!! Do not buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond disappointed with this product. Firstly, it never stays upright. The moment I lightly touch it, it flops. And yes, I am doing it correctly based on the instructions and photos. Secondly, the rubber-coated piece that holds the Mini in flat slid partially off by the second day. Internally it has double-sided tape, which is of no use once the piece slides off. Every day I am affixing the piece back on and it slides right back off. Lastly, the keyboard feels cheap. A complete waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Fits a Nexus 7 (Gen 2) like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Just a quick review to let people know that this case fits the Nexus 7 Gen 2 extremely well. The corners aren't an 'exact' fit, but you have to look really close to see it. Also, I have pretty large hands and can type on the keyboard pretty well...better than any of keyboards out there of similar size that I tried. The feel and responsiveness of the keys is excellent. The case itself has a sleek, clean look and feel, unlike many of the leather ones out there. As stated in previous reviews, the placement of the apostrophe is kind of baffling, but it doesn't seem to bother me personally.
customer_reviews.author: Lucius

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Product
customer_reviews.text: I don't do many reviews but this case is worth the effort. I could whine about the learning curve and gettng familiar with a compact keyboard but that's life. If you want a compact Ipad, then live in the world you are creating. This is a great, well designed, quality product. People who see my Ipad case imediately talk about getting one for themselves. A+++
customer_reviews.author: Darren Genson

customer_reviews.title: could not get to "pair" with ipad mini
customer_reviews.text: Maybe mine was defective, wasn't going to take a second chance. Tried half a day, even went on Belkin website for support and still did not work. Was a special birthday gift that was ruined. As for the keyboard itself, really liked the raised keys, very quick delivery. Hopefully even faster return and money refunded.
customer_reviews.author: brallas

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed since I have known Belkin should be of a ...
customer_reviews.text: I received this keyboard and it does not work. I connected as advised in the manual but never charges and led lights keeps on all the time and it should be turns off automatically when is full charged but never did. Still connected I tried to pair with the I pad but i doesn't connect wireless. Very disappointed since I have known Belkin should be of a good quality. What should I do next to fix this?.
customer_reviews.author: EAT

customer_reviews.title: Now have 2 to return!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how to rate this at this point. the first one I received seems to have an issue with the backspace button, works part time at best. I requested a replacement that was delivered yesterday, that one has an issue with the USB on the unit. It appears to be loose in the case and wont line up with the opening so it can be charged. Ive just ordered the 2nd replacement now. Not happy that I will now have 2 to return. Will update after I get this new replacement.
customer_reviews.author: JTatge6

customer_reviews.title: not to bad
customer_reviews.text: For me this helped me decide on moving to the ipad air and the mini with the keyboard todo email or even right papers just wasnt big enough.. the keyboard was ok but certainly not close to a standard keyboard
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: question about keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife's ipad mini and she's not sure if it's exactly what she wants (i.e. some of the prompt things like hyphens, etc., are different than on a larger keyboard. The question is...might it be possible to send this one back and trade it (with the appropriate cost difference) for a regular sized keyboard from you? I would appreciate your thoughts on this. My name isn't "3", but somehow it was given to me when I first started ordering things on Amazon. My name is actually Dr. Roy Klassen, if you'd rather address me that way. Thanks for your consideration.

customer_reviews.title: keys are so tiny and it's really heavy
customer_reviews.text: the idea of an ipad mini is that it's small, light and portable. this keyboard is the exact opposite. it's very heavy, bulky and almost impossible to type on because the keys are so small.
customer_reviews.author: matt walker

customer_reviews.title: It worked fine until I went to charge it for the second ...
customer_reviews.text: Got one for a Christmas present. It worked fine until I went to charge it for the second time. The USB connector had come loose and was rattling around inside the keyboard. Got a replacement (very promptly from Amazon). It was ok until I went to charge this one for the second time. The USB connector was loose on this one too. It recesses too far into the keyboard to make a connection. Apparently, they are only for a single use.
customer_reviews.author: Shelia

customer_reviews.title: Never buy this product  Junk
customer_reviews.text: This is was the biggest piece of junk I have ever bought THE CHARGER plug attached to the keyboard fell off after using it 4 times. The whole electronic board disconnected this was not from abuse this was poor workmanship.
customer_reviews.author: DerekM

customer_reviews.title: but then you're good. I charge it weekly
customer_reviews.text: this one works. the keyboard takes a bit of adjusting, but then you're good. I charge it weekly.
customer_reviews.author: ezyErnie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little getting used to versus a laptop keyboard. And yes, the comma is pretty irksome, but not impossible to a touch typist. It does what I want it to.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Furter

customer_reviews.title: Returned it kept slipping and flatten itself
customer_reviews.text: The back support was not able to support the mini ipad kept slipping and becoming flat. I feel the Shark one looks better and has a 360 degrees view too. This is limited in terms of viewing and orientation.
customer_reviews.author: Hiten J. Thakkar

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this, but I sent it back. It doesn't stand well and I didn't like the keypad being unprotected while reading an ebook. And I had to snap/unsnap it from the case when going back and forth. Just too much of a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Captain mommy

customer_reviews.title: Charging port broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: After only a few charging sessions, the charging port was loose and not able to accept a charge any longer making the keyboard unusable. I would not recommend this product due to its unreliable charging and lack of quality. It is now useless.
customer_reviews.author: dackels

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: Sides split from turning the cover back to fold it up. It is not worth the money so buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Lori H.

customer_reviews.title: cumbersome
customer_reviews.text: very cumbersome keyboard. It is much easier to use the virtual keyboard on the iPad itself. Therefore I returned this product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Givon

customer_reviews.title: Belkin wireless kb for iPad mini
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time very well package no damage to the keyboard. It's easy to type on it and works well with the iPad mini
customer_reviews.author: LUIS RIVERA

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The tab bit that holds the iPad in place came a little loose and looks like it is broken
customer_reviews.author: a0365c

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: don't know what I'd do with out it fits my needs perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Charles Dunbar

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient and very easy to install and use
customer_reviews.text: The wireless keyboard makes sending e-mail and browsing the web an absolute breeze. The pad is OK for a couple of e-mail's but when you have several to send the keyboard makes it much faster and easier.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Warren

customer_reviews.title: Case flap not good at all as a stand - cover doesn't turn off the screen
customer_reviews.text: The flap which makes the stand is so flimsy. And the case is so smooth that the keyboard portion keeps sliding away from the cover flap and falls flat. I had to use a paperclip to keep the keyboard base from sliding on the table surface away from the stand flap. I bought two of these and I'm returning them. Also, when closing it up, there's no magnet to turn off the iPad screen.
customer_reviews.author: Randal Ansile

customer_reviews.title: fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Keyboard is the perfect size to type comfortably, and it works wonderfully. Several of my co-workers have ordered this now as well.
customer_reviews.author: Iguanagirl

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to try this after reading the other good reviews on this keyboard case. Did not disappoint. Easy to use and build quality is high. The only slight trouble I have was the triangular folding to make the iPad Mini stands upright. Sometimes, the folding does not hold well and would give way. Perhaps the magnetic portions could be make stronger for the folding to stay in shape. Other than that, I am enjoying the stylish casing.
customer_reviews.author: Low Kok Hoe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it's exactly what I had in mind. In fact, my friend has the exact same thing so I knew that was what I wanted and I didn't even bother shopping around. Looks stylish, easy to carry and gives me the protection and the functionality I was after for working and studying on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Loudine Heunis

customer_reviews.title: Ipad Mini Keyboard Case
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed when mine stopped working. I had always trusted it was a good long-lasting product, but it wasn't.
customer_reviews.author: SScuccuglia

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: I received the product on time and the instructions were very plain for a first time iPad user. The keyboard is a nice size and holds my iPad mini perfectly. I love the fact that I can prop it up and type when I am working on a paper.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Brown

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't quite fit nexus 7
customer_reviews.text: all the reviews I read said this is perfect for the nexus 7, but it doesn't quite fit. The top corners are about an inch above the top of the tablet; however, it fits along the long side, stands up properly, and works well otherwise. I would just be aware of the not-perfect-fit prior to purchasing for the nexus 7. I haven't found a different bluetooth keyboard/case that fits the nexus 7 properly.
customer_reviews.author: Chirona Risom

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The connector in the charging port fell out so I can't charge keyboard. In addition the keys are not very responsive and don't have a good feel.
customer_reviews.author: RaymondC

customer_reviews.title: Cheap case
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard work great but the case is cheaply made. Targus brand is much better, pay a little more and get a better brand.
customer_reviews.author: Bluelu

customer_reviews.title: Nothing's perfect
customer_reviews.text: I must say nothing is perfect but the Belkin wireless keyboard comes pretty close, it is a great cover and the keyboard has really been a great asset as well. Thanks Belkin for making such a great product it's all I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie D.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, could be better
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Wish the screen would rotate. Also not so steady when propped up. The keyboard is ever basement and responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Premier Gold

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality,breaks easily,damages ipad WAY overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: This case broke shortly after I purchased it. Now my ipad falls out all the time., lame. Also the friction caused by taking the ipad out of the case caused damage to the rim of my black ipad and there are spots of silver showing through. In short this product was not worth the price. My sisters 30 dollar ipad case w/keyboard has held up better than mine.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: I Like!
customer_reviews.text: I like! Yes, it;s small but so is the mini 3 so ...hey. It arrived 1 day before the first expected delivery day. I just typer this review on it.:)
customer_reviews.author: Ozzie Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: All went well no issues, I would use this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Bilger

customer_reviews.title: Not recommendable!
customer_reviews.text: Within a month, the foldable cover started to become ineffective in supporting my iPad Mini 2 when used in landscape mode. The only positive is that it protects the screen from unwanted scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Silmai

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, broken in no time
customer_reviews.text: This who idea was great, but the clips that hold the ipad in broke in no time costing me 200.00 in another ipad purchase!
customer_reviews.author: DeVona Lahrman

customer_reviews.title: keyboard convenience
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 10 year old son who has difficulty writing. its very easy to use ad has made his life much easier
customer_reviews.author: Salon Bohemia

customer_reviews.title: I bought this keyboard/case as a gift, and the person who received it is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard is very good, since it is for an ipad mini....I thought the keys might be too small for a man's fingers, but they are not. The case is very nice to look at and use. The ipad mini can be "stood up" and that is very helpful when using the keypad. This keyboard/case met my expectations in every way
customer_reviews.author: Sue Fredell

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I am very pleased with the item
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I am very pleased with the item. Next time, I would like to purchase a Belkin Bluetooth Keyboard for my iPad mini with the automatic sleep notch on it.
customer_reviews.author: Giggy Norwood

customer_reviews.title: Nice case, wouldn't charge
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of Belkin keyboards - including this one. The case itself adds minimal bulk, also nice. Con for me is identical to the reviewer whose charging port was busted. Mine was busted as well - cord would not hold which meant keyboard would not charge. For a lower price, I might have tried again. At $79, I didn't want to take the chance. With someone else describing same problem, even less inclined to try again. It's too bad. I like this darn keyboard a lot.
customer_reviews.author: elpyess

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: So easy and fast! I'm so happy with this thing! easy to carry and much more! Been using it alot....kinda feels using my laptop though! its cute and small! Thanks amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: way27az

customer_reviews.title: beware!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this keyboard two week ago. I was excited to start using it, so I quickly got it charged-up and sync with my iPad. The keyboard is easy to use, the folio is nice looking and not too bulky. Unfortunately, when I went to charge the keyboard two days ago, it came to my attention that the internal fitting that holds the power cord connected to the keyboard has become detached and is now roaming around loose inside the keyboard housing. Very disappointing! I don't have the original packing materials, so I cannot return it to Amazon. The Belkin website is a joke, there is no way to get any customer support. I guess I just wasted $80...
customer_reviews.author: julien

customer_reviews.title: back support
customer_reviews.text: as a protective case it works fine, and keyboard works good battery life is good. The back support is terrible it will not stay in place when you are touching the screen. I had to but Velcro on it to solve the problem of it falling down when I touched the screen.
customer_reviews.author: jon rockafellow

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Love that it is rechargeable and you do ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Love that it is rechargeable and you do not have to change batteries. Much easier to type with than the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Bahrwon

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT Buy. This product fell apart on me ...
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT Buy. This product fell apart on me and getting a new one from the manufacturer was a nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Pepler

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced, but kind of small (which is to be expected).
customer_reviews.text: I feel like warning other people who are planning on buying a keyboard for their Ipad Mini. The keyboards are extremely small! This doesn't effect their usefulness though, but it does mean like a while to get used to.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: did not turn on, even after following instructions and charging. very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kyla

customer_reviews.title: Not much of a case
customer_reviews.text: Case and keyboard worked ok, until it fell from two feet off the ground and the clips that hold the iPad in place shattered. I tried to repair it to no avail. $40 down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Axler

customer_reviews.title: Belkin Wireless Keyboard and case for iPad Mini
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and very lightweight and easy to use. But, the functionality is not that great. It doesn't stand easily so that you can type as the back isn't very sturdy. Also the back clip has broken and I have not had it for very long. I wouldn't recommend it. Back to the drawing board for me.
customer_reviews.author: Hevvy3

customer_reviews.title: Satisfactory
customer_reviews.text: Case is in very good cosmetic condition but very upset that the delete key does not work on the keyboard. That's what I get for buying used I guess....
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: Serves the purpose
customer_reviews.text: Only serves the purpose to somewhat protect the device. The clip that holds it in broke on the first day. Not built very well. And it has a very hard time standing in an upright position. Will be looking for something better.
customer_reviews.author: cscopa

customer_reviews.title: don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard stops working on certain keys and the charging port for key board was in a stable position at all.
customer_reviews.author: DJ431249

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for 2 months before the top portion broke ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for 2 months before the top portion broke off that holds the ipad to the case. Used with mild frequency before this occurred. Keys are small and hard to type on
customer_reviews.author: Kfer23

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Bad quality. Material started falling apart after only a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro V.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with birthday gift!
customer_reviews.text: We purchase the item for our goddaughter's birthday. Her Mom brought her an ipad and it fit perfectly in the case, she loved it!!! She is a teacher and very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gressel

customer_reviews.title: GREAT KEYBOARD IPAD MINI
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister and husband and they love it! They said it was perfect for their IPad Mini! They said they would recommend this product to all their friends!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Y.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Just buy it, works really great with your iPad. you don't have to be a tech savvy to sync it
customer_reviews.author: carlos garcia

customer_reviews.title: Portable Keyboard Case for ipad mini F5L145ttBLK
customer_reviews.text: I like the Belkin Wireless keyboard Case for iPad mini F5L145ttBLK, but the box it arrived in did not have the USB-MICRO-USB charging cable or the User manual.Both of these items were supposed to part of sale. How do I get the missing items?
customer_reviews.author: Capt. Joe

customer_reviews.title: Some key fails after a year
customer_reviews.text: After using a year time, some keys failed to response. It should be a product used for years but now I have to give up.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie K. K. To

customer_reviews.title: It was a good
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my granddaughter. Just what we expected. It was a good choice
customer_reviews.author: Rick Golichowski

customer_reviews.title: Belkin keyboard for mini ipadd
customer_reviews.text: the one I ordered through Amazon,com had to be returned to Belkin because it was defective. I now have a second one that I ordered through Belkin and it is working great.
customer_reviews.author: Judith L.Moore

customer_reviews.title: Belkin wireless
customer_reviews.text: Works flawlessly with my MIni Ipad is all I have to say about it now. Much easier than using the built in keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: rjking222

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality item.I bought it for a gift and has worked great.if you are considering it for purchase you won't be disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rbobert crane

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Even tho I dont use it as often as I thought I would, its still handy for certain situations when I need an external keyboard to my ipad
customer_reviews.author: Dingelberry

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard is good. Its a good compact cover
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard is good. Its a good compact cover. The stand leaves a little more to be desired. I find it often slipping off its standing position.
customer_reviews.author: nilesh chaturvedi

customer_reviews.title: Works good.
customer_reviews.text: Product looks and works great. No problems at all. Would buy as a gift for my friends and family. .

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I've had this case for only one month and the side support is defective already. It fails to secure my iPad in place. The securement is made of rubber and poor in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Carr

customer_reviews.title: Keys are ok and smooth but the clip was so ...
customer_reviews.text: Keys are ok and smooth but the clip was so crisp that it it took off after a few days.
customer_reviews.author: AntonGeorge

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard increases use of mini
customer_reviews.text: This product enabled me to be able to use the mini at work. The keys took some time to get used to. The design of the support for the pad could be better but over all a very good product .
customer_reviews.author: michael e west

customer_reviews.title: Bracket and keyboard broken within the first month of receiving it.
customer_reviews.text: Within a couple of weeks the bracket broke and the following week the keyboard stopped working. I now have to go to the trouble of researching how to return it.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item from Warehouse inc. The product stopped working after 1 month! It says there is a 1 year limited warranty so I am trying to see if Belkin would replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Chabeli Florian

customer_reviews.title: Malfunction keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the letter "L" key on my Belkin iPad mini keyboard is not functioning. And so far, I cannot seen to get help from Belkin. Thanks Vince Dike
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Workable
customer_reviews.text: Not great but workable not a perfect solution doesn't want to stand up like it shows in the pictures but it works
customer_reviews.author: peter rose

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard works fine but the stand is awkward and a piece broke off after very little use. In retrospect I would buy the apple case and keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Jason A Bain

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard works better than I expected and the keys are not too small for my fingers. Anyone with an iPad Mini will fall in love with it!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Davis

customer_reviews.title: Handy for work & email when traveling
customer_reviews.text: Like the convenience, very helpful when traveling. Works well once you get used to the small form factor. The thickness and the weight take getting used to also.
customer_reviews.author: Jay A. Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Work very well
customer_reviews.text: with this keyboard became my Ipad Mini into a true laptop. Facilities very text typing, the keys are soft and there is no delay in typing.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo

customer_reviews.title: Recharge wire & instructions should have accompanied device @ delivery
customer_reviews.text: i HAD NOT IDEA IT REQUIRED RECHARGING, NO RECHARGE WIRE OR DIRECTIONS PROVIDED. Until my IT GURU cked it out when it stopped operating due to exhausted battery.
customer_reviews.author: Raphael Nussdorf  MD

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: typing is better as I get used to keyboard, my main need.
customer_reviews.author: henry  fuerte

customer_reviews.title: Wont Last Long
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for about 10 months. Weak bluetooth signals, thick and uncomfortable keys. Would rather spend a bit more and get something of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: mini Ipad
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my son. He said that the case is great!!! He likes the size and how well it is made for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Sutch

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The backspace button did not work on two of these when I ordered them.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I have not had time to use it. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Gardner

customer_reviews.title: It would be nice If this worked
customer_reviews.text: I did my research on this, and very dissapointed that it does not work. we have tried putting the code in multiple times, and noting. i will continue to try, because i need to have a key board on my ipad, especially when i travel for conferences. VERY DISSAPOINTED.
customer_reviews.author: G. Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. Keyboard stopped working after five days. Screen keeps falling down won't stay up. Do not buy waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Cooper

customer_reviews.title: very nice product
customer_reviews.text: excellent, just as described only a little better :) very happy with the entire transaction, and will buy again soon!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Pletcher

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, good quality, Easy to work, the keyboard work good, and the instruction was easy to apply thanks, and regards
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo G

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: Slim, long battery life. Keys are easy to get used to. It is good value for its price. recomend it.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Vargas

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I have used and owned a number of iPad keyboard cases, including Zagg and Kensington. I was happy with my Zagg for the iPad, but wondered what I'd do when I got my iPad Mini. I needed a keyboard case to take notes and type quickly when in meetings. This Belkin keyboard/case combo is the nicest available. The case is very sleek and keyboard is well designed. Comparing this to the keyboard/case offerings I have used with my full size iPad, this is the best keyboard/case available today.
customer_reviews.author: GregMeixner

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item
customer_reviews.text: It was nice but I had asked for a case for the Samsung S3 tablet. I need to return it but can't find the paper work.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Guthery

customer_reviews.title: Not worthy of the ipad
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard case was a disappointment and is being returned. The on/off button is a little plastic part that sticks out and no doubt will break soon. The case does not well support the keyboard on an angle and I needed to adjust and re-adjust many times during a simple email. The mini does not shut off when the case is closed. Over all use was frustrating and had me irritated with the mini. I purchased the Snugg iPad mini cover at the same time to make a comparison. I am glad that I did. The Snugg is a much better product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary1

product_meta.title: Belkin QODE Portable Bluetooth Keyboard and Case for iPad mini 3, iPad mini 2 with Retina Display and iPad mini (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackThe Portable Keyboard Case is a protective folio and laptop-style keyboard in one, designed specifically for the iPad mini. Well-spaced keys are the most responsive, comfortably sized keys of any keyboard this size. When it’s time to relax, the keyboard folds completely flat and out of the way for comfortable handheld viewing.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


 The Belkin Portable Keyboard Case for iPad mini offers iPad mini users a convenient and comfortable alternative to touchscreen typing. This stylish, durable case safeguards your device from scratches and scuffs. A well-spaced keyboard has been integrated into the case and allows you to type faster and with fewer errors than on the iPad mini's touchscreen. The keyboard connects to iPad mini via Bluetooth and offers shortcut keys for easy typing and quick access to media controls.

Case folds for ideal typing angle. View larger.

 Well-spaced, spring-loaded keys for comfortable typing. View larger.

 Wireless keyboard folds flat onto the protective case and slips easily into a bag or purse. View larger.

THE CLOSEST THING TO A FULL-SIZED KEYBOARD FOR YOUR IPAD MINI
 With a key pitch similar to that of full-sized keyboards, the Belkin Portable Keyboard Case for iPad mini simplifies emailing, word processing, instant messaging, and other typing-heavy tablet activities. Each of the keyboard keys has a scissor key mechanism that provides tactile feedback when struck.

 Additionally, shortcut keys specific to iPad mini allow you to easily adjust volume and control your music or video.

SLIM AND PORTABLE
This lightweight case weighs only 9.8 ounces and snugly fits the iPad mini, keeping it compact enough to slip into a bag or purse. Only 3/4 inches thick, the case conveniently fits into any bag or purse for travel.

LOW-PROFILE PROTECTION
 The keyboard folds flat onto the case so it stays out of your way when viewing media on your iPad mini. The case offers protection for the iPad mini with its soft PU leather on the outside and grip suede on the inside, helping to protect your iPad mini from scratches, scuffs, and wear.

CAMERA LENS CUTOUT FOR EASY PHOTO TAKING
 A cutout in the case's back makes it easy to take pictures without having to remove your iPad mini.

BLUETOOTH CONNECTION FOR WIRELESS TYPING
 With low-powered Bluetooth 3.0 and a 200 mAh battery, this keyboard doesn't compromise long life for its slimness. In fact, it can last for 155 hours of active use without needing another charge.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
 Belkin Portable Keyboard Case for iPad mini, USB-to-Micro-USB charging cable, and user manual.

PORTABLE KEYBOARD CASE FOR IPAD MINI
AT A GLANCE:
 * Made of soft PU leather on the outside and grip suede on the inside for durability
 * Large, easy-to-type keys (1.6-millimeter key pitch) for comfortable typing
 * Keyboard connects to iPad mini via Bluetooth
 * Shortcut keys offer quick access to iPad mini media controls
 * 155 hours active battery life

WELL-SPACED KEYS
EASY TO HOLD
SLIM & PORTABLE
COMFORTABLE
feature_bullets: Innovative design allows keyboard to fold completely flat for handheld viewing
Pairs with iPad mini through Bluetooth
60 hours active battery life, 2,000 hours standby battery life
Compatible with iPad mini 3, iPad mini 2 with Retina Display and iPad mini
